allPost.title: Creating video from text
allPost.excerpt: Sora can generate videos up to a minute long while maintaining visual quality and adherence to the user’s prompt.
allPost.content:
Sora is an AI model that can create realistic and imaginative scenes from text instructions.
 
 Today, Sora is becoming available to red teamers to assess critical areas for harms or risks.
  
 We are also granting access to a number of visual artists, designers, and filmmakers to gain feedback on how to advance the model to be most helpful for creative professionals.
 
 We’re sharing our research progress early to start working with and getting feedback from people outside of OpenAI and to give the public a sense of what AI capabilities are on the horizon.
 
 ## Safety
 
  We’ll be taking several important safety steps ahead of making Sora available in OpenAI’s products.

allPost.title: Generates images from text description by conditional ver GPT.
allPost.excerpt: Generates diverse and creative images based on textual prompts.
allPost.content:
Model Description: Generates images from textual descriptions using a conditional version of GPT.
 
 * Item Model Category: Natural Language Processing (NLP) for Image Generation
 
 * Item Model Developer/Organization: OpenAI
 
 * Item Model Architecture: Transformer
 
 * Item Key Features: Generates diverse and creative images based on textual prompts.
 
 * Item Performance Metrics: Notable for its capability to generate high-quality images from textual descriptions.
 
 * Item Availability: Proprietary (API access provided by OpenAI)
 
 * Item Wikipedia:  [link](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/DALL-E) **https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/DALL-E** 
 
 * Item Microsoft blog: [link](https://create.microsoft.com/en-us/learn/articles/how-to-image-prompts-dall-e-ai) **https://create.microsoft.com/en-us/learn/articles/how-to-image-prompts-dall-e-ai**
